Trigger.name: prompt
Trigger.script: writePrompt() cureHM() checkWord() checkBalance() checkAfflict() if targetShield then echo("\tTARGET SHIELD UP!!!\n") end

regexCodeList.string: You have nothing to store in the rift.

Trigger.name: Synthesis Continue
Trigger.script:
if synContinue then if synLeft > 0 then if (synLeft % 10) == 0 then cecho("<green>
		" .. synLeft .. " Syntheses left.
") elseif (synLeft % 5) == 0 then cecho("<yellow>
		" .. synLeft .. " Syntheses left.
") end synLeft = synLeft - 1 Synthesise(synMetal, synBase) else cecho("<red>
		Synthesis of " .. synMetal .. " complete.") end end

Trigger.name: Transmutation Continue
Trigger.script:
if transContinue then if transLeft > 0 then if (transLeft % 10) == 0 then cecho("<green>
		" .. transLeft .. " Transmutations left.
") elseif (transLeft % 5) == 0 then cecho("<yellow>
		" .. transLeft .. " Transmutations left.
") end transLeft = transLeft - 1 Transmute(transMineral) else cecho("<red>
		Transmutation of " .. transMineral .. " complete.") end end

regexCodeList.string: You place your reactants into a large glass flask, heating it over a bright candle as you add a thin acid to dissolve them.
^With careful measurements, \w+ reacts \w+ with a series of solvents and powders to synthesise a group of .+\.$

^\w+ places (her|his) reactants into a large glass flask, heating it over a bright candle as (she|he) adds a thin acid to dissolve them. Once the solution is saturated, (she|he) pours in a drop of water to force out a group of .+?, which (she|he) filters and collects.$
Imbuing your voice with power, you intone,
You may intone another word of power.

Trigger.name: shieldup
Trigger.script: if string.find(matches[2], target) then targetShield = true else echo("\t ERROR!!!\n") end

regexCodeList.string: ^A nearly invisible magical shield forms around (.+)$

Trigger.name: shielddown
Trigger.script: if targetShield then targetShield = false end

regexCodeList.string: You unleash a vicious reaping blow at
Directing your power against the magical shield surrounding
A dizzying beam of energy strikes you as your attack rebounds off of
You may drink another health or mana elixir.
You may eat another bit of irid moss or potash.

Trigger.name: eatconsumable
Trigger.script: if string.find(matches[2], eatQueue[1]) then table.remove(eatQueue, 1) mineralBal = false mineralEating = false end

regexCodeList.string: You may eat another plant or mineral.

Alias.name: run lua code
Alias.script:
local f,e = loadstring("return "..matches[2]) if not f then f,e = assert(loadstring(matches[2])) end
local r = f() if r ~= nil then display(r) end

Alias.name: GMCP print
Alias.script: if matches[2] and matches[3] then display(gmcp[matches[2]][matches[3]]) elseif matches[2] then display(gmcp[matches[2]]) else display(gmcp) end

Alias.name: findRiftAmount
Alias.script:
local inrift = matches[2] local foundrift = false for k,v in ipairs(rift) do if v.name == inrift then print(v.amount) foundrift = true end end
if not foundrift then print("Not found!") end

Alias.name: inr all
Alias.script: isInrAll = true send("inr all", false) tempTimer( 0.5, [[parseRift()]])

Alias.name: Transmute Full
Alias.script:
transContinue = true enableTrigger("Transmute Continue") transMineral = matches[2]
transLeft = math.floor((cureRiftMax - riftList[transMineral])/5) - 1 echo("Need to transmute " .. transLeft .. " times!")
Transmute(transMineral)

Alias.name: Synthesis Interrupt
Synthesis Full
Synthesis Some
Alias.script:
synContinue = true enableTrigger("Synthesis Continue") synMetal = matches[3] synDesired = tonumber(matches[2])
if synMetal == "gold" or synMetal == "silver" then synBase = "mercury" elseif synMetal == "iron" or synMetal == "lead" then synBase = "salt" elseif synMetal == "tin" or synMetal == "copper" then synBase = "sulphur" end
if synDesired < riftList[synBase] then synLeft = synDesired - 1 else synLeft = riftList[synBase] - 1 end
echo("\n\t\tSynthesising " .. synLeft .. " times!\n") Synthesise(synMetal, synBase)

Alias.name: word queueing
Alias.script: if hasWord then send(matches[1]) else table.insert(wordQueue, matches[1]) echo("WORD '"..matches[2].."' QUEUED") end

Script.name: variableInit
startUp
Script.script:
function startUp() gmod.enableModule("Proxia", "IRE.Rift") gmod.enableModule("Proxia", "Comm.Channel") send(" ") sendGMCP("IRE.Rift.Request") send(" ") tempTimer(0.2, [[parseRift()]]) tempTimer(0.3, [[variableInit()]]) tempTimer(0.5, [[echo("\n\t\tJob's done!\n")]])
end

Script.name: gagLine
Script.script: function gagLine() moveCursor(0,getLineCount()-1) deleteLine() moveCursor(0,getLineCount()) deleteLine() end

Script.name: prompt
Script.script:
function determineColor(print) if print > 70 then return "green" elseif print > 40 then return "yellow" else return "red" end end
function displayNumber(num) if num >= 100 then return num elseif num > 9 then return ("0"..tostring(num)) elseif num > 999 then return "XXX" else return ("00"..tostring(num)) end end
function writePrompt() local hp = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) local mp = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp)
hpPerc = math.floor((hp/maxHP)*100) mpPerc = math.floor((mp/maxMP)*100)
cecho("<" .. determineColor(hpPerc) ..">[".. displayNumber(hpPerc) .."%HP]") cecho("<" .. determineColor(mpPerc) ..">[".. displayNumber(mpPerc) .."%MP]") cecho("<white>["..displayNumber(tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.nl)) .. "%XP]") if hunting then local tmp = string.split(gmcp.Char.Vitals.charstats[2], " ") local rage = tonumber(tmp[2]) cecho("<white>["..displayNumber(rage).."RG]") end echo(" - ") end
function checkWord() if hasWord and #wordQueue > 0 then send(wordQueue[1]) table.remove(wordQueue, 1) end end
function checkBalance() if gmcp.Char.Vitals.bal == "1" then hasBal = true else hasBal = false end
if hasBal and #balQueue > 0 then send(balQueue[1]) table.remove(balQueue, 1) end end
function checkAfflict() if #afflictList > 0 then if not string.find(afflictList[1].cure, "eat") and not string.find(afflictList[1].cure, "smoke") then if (afflictList[1].afflict ~= "prone") and (afflictList[1].afflict ~= "sleeping") then send(afflictList[1].cure) elseif not didSit then send(afflictList[1].cure) end end end end

Script.name: keytables
transmutation table
Script.script: transTable = { ferrum = {"sulphur", "2 airon"}, stannum = {"salt", "2 tin"}, dolomite = {"salt", "lead", "airon"}, antimony = {"salt", "lead", "asilver"}, bisemutum = {"sulphur", "airon", "tin"}, cuprum = {"salt" , "2 copper"}, magnesium = {"sulphur", "tin", "asilver"}, calamine = {"sulphur", "airon", "agold"}, malachite = {"2 salt", "2 copper"}, azurite = {"sulphur", "2 copper"}, plumbum = {"sulphur", "2 lead"}, realgar = {"2 sulphur", "2 tin"}, arsenic = {"salt", "lead", "tin"}, gypsum = {"sulphur", "airon", "asilver"}, argentum = {"salt", "2 asilver"}, calcite = {"salt", "airon", "copper"}, potash = {"sulphur", "asilver", "agold"}, quicksilver = {"2 mercury", "asilver"}, aurum = {"sulphur", "2 agold"}, quartz = {"salt", "tin", "agold"}, cinnabar = {"2 sulphur", "2 mercury"} }

Script.name: synthesis functions
Script.script:
function Synthesise(metal, base) send("outr " .. base) send("synthesise " .. metal) end
function Transmute(mineral) for k,v in ipairs(transTable[mineral]) do send("outr " .. v) end send("transmutate " .. mineral) end

Script.name: extract
Script.script: function extract() if extracting then if not setContains(extractedRooms, gmcp.Room.Info.num) then addToSet(extractedRooms, gmcp.Room.Info.num) if gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "Constructed underground" then table.insert(balQueue, "extract mercury") table.insert(balQueue, "extract sulphur") table.insert(balQueue, "extract salt") table.insert(balQueue, "inr all") end end end end

Script.name: riftUpdate
Script.script: function riftUpdate() if isInrAll then isInrAll = false else changedItem = gmcp.IRE.Rift.Change.name for k,v in ipairs(riftList) do if v.name == changedItem then v.amount = gmcp.IRE.Rift.Change.amount end end parseRift() end end

Script.name: Rift Functions
Script.script: function parseRift() for k,v in ipairs(gmcp.IRE.Rift.List) do riftList[v.name] = tonumber(v.amount) end end

Script.name: cureHM
Script.script: function cureHM() if sipBal then if hpPerc < 80 then send("sip health") sipBal = false elseif mpPerc < 80 then send("sip mana") sipBal = false end end if potashBal then if (0 <= hpPerc and hpPerc < 60) or (0 <= mpPerc and mpPerc < 60) then potashBal = false eatPotash = true end end if eatPotash == true then if isInInv("potash") then send("eat potash") else send("outr potash") end end end

Script.name: consumables
Script.script: function eatCure() if isInInv(eatQueue[1]) then send("eat " .. eatQueue[1]) else send("outr " .. eatQueue[1]) end end

Script.name: addAfflict
Script.script: function addAfflict() local afflict = gmcp.Char.Afflictions.Add.name local cure = gmcp.Char.Afflictions.Add.cure if afflict == "sleeping" then cure = "wake" end table.insert(afflictList, {afflict = afflict, cure = cure}) echo(afflict .. " is cured by " .. cure .. "!\n") end

Script.name: removeAfflict
Inventory Initialization
Script.script: function invInit() sendGMCP("Char.Items.Inv") send(" ") if gmcp.Char.Items.List.location == "inv" then for k,v in ipairs(gmcp.Char.Items.List.items) do invList[v.id] = v.name end else echo("\n\tInventory error! Could not access inv through GMCP!\n") end end

Script.name: removeItem
Script.script: function removeItem() local loc = gmcp.Char.Items.Remove.location if loc == "inv" then invList[gmcp.Char.Items.Remove.item.id] = nil end end

Script.name: addItem
Script.script: function addItem() local loc = gmcp.Char.Items.Add.location if loc == "inv" then invList[gmcp.Char.Items.Add.item.id] = gmcp.Char.Items.Add.item.name end end

Script.name: misc inventory scripts
Script.script: function isInInv(item) for id, name in pairs(invList) do if string.find(name, item) then return true end end end

Key.name: reap/cull
Key.script: if isReap then isReap = false attack = "shadow cull" echo("\t\tCulling\n") else isReap = true attack = "shadow reap" echo("\t\tReaping\n") end

Key.name: New Key
Key.script: if not hunting then hunting = true cecho("\t\t<red>Now Hunting\n") else hunting = false cecho("\t\t<green>Not Hunting\n") end

Key.name: synharvest
